comments.author: Adriana
comments.body: Cycling, bah! I'm doing some real competing today: semi-finals game for open league ultimate frisbee! Huck that. -Adriana

comments.author: Werner
comments.body: What a hoot that one of the exits in the text-based game was "DENNIS!" I never thought of Dennis as an exit before. --MW

comments.author: Anonymous
comments.body: I think Matt is likely to be eaten by a grue.

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: What I do with "grues" is my own business, thank you very much.
